document_data.mainbody: 'Mangobarl Lorren''' was the baker of [[Red Larch]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis. He ran his shop in that village.
document_data.Relationship: He was a staunch and discreet ally of the [[Zhentarim]], thanks to some of his distant relatives who were in that organization. He told them all about what he heard in the village.
document_data.Personality: He loved to gossip and knew all kinds of wild tales, few of them true.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], he heard about [[Pell Mhandyvver]]'s scare at the [[Haunted Tomb]] and went to look for himself, discovering a [[goblin]].
